channel.title: Productivity on Ray Tsang
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Ray Tsang

item.title: Principles of Developer Experience
item.description: Abstract Often we hear people talk about “great developer experience” but what does that mean? It seems to be like “beauty” – in the eye of the beholder. Yet, great developer experience (DX) is 100% about developer productivity and can be measured in terms of value and time. There are 4 key principles that help guide us to deliver value and reduce friction to increase productivity and thus deliver experiences which developers will love.
